envelopes.name: Credit Underwriting
assumptions: Credit models are tested for disparate impact across protected classes.
Applicants receive clear explanations for adverse actions.
Human review is required for all denials and near-threshold decisions.
constraints: No use of protected class attributes in decisioning
All denials must include specific adverse action reasons
Manual review required for borderline cases (±5% of threshold)

envelopes.name: Fraud Detection
assumptions: Fraud models prioritize accuracy over false positive minimization.
Customers can dispute fraud flags with documented evidence.
Geographic and behavioral patterns are monitored for legitimacy.
constraints: High-risk flags require secondary verification
Legitimate customer transactions must not be blocked repeatedly
Appeal process completes within 48 hours

envelopes.name: Collections & Hardship Programs
assumptions: Collections outreach is respectful and compliant with FDCPA.
Hardship programs are offered proactively to qualifying customers.
Payment plans are sustainable based on income verification.
constraints: No contact outside permitted hours (8am-9pm local time)
Hardship eligibility assessed before aggressive collections
Cease communication upon written request

envelopes.name: Regulatory Compliance Monitoring
assumptions: All lending decisions are auditable with full lineage.
Regulatory reporting is automated and validated daily.
Model risk management processes are documented and tested.
constraints: Adverse action notices sent within 30 days
Maintain 7-year audit trail for all credit decisions
Quarterly fairness testing for disparate impact

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Credit underwriting envelope (REV-FIN-001-D) activated with updated fairness constraints.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Fraud detection envelope (REV-FIN-002-B) activated with improved false positive reduction.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Compliance monitoring envelope (REV-FIN-004-C) activated for Q1 regulatory period.

events.label: Historical baseline embedding
events.detail: Baseline historical embeddings for lending scenario.

events.label: Credit market conditions stable
events.detail: Prime rate unchanged at 7.25%. Average FICO scores trending up slightly (+3 pts). Delinquency rates holding steady at 2.4%. Economic outlook positive.

events.label: Credit application approved
events.detail: CreditScorer approved $15,000 personal loan at 8.2% APR. Risk score: 725, within auto-approve threshold.

events.label: Borderline case retrieval
events.detail: BorderlineReviewer retrieved similar borderline applications and approval patterns before escalation.
events.queryText: borderline applications near threshold requiring manual review

events.label: Borderline case flagged
events.detail: BorderlineReviewer escalated application to human underwriter. Score: 682 (threshold: 680±5%). Manual review required.

events.label: Manual approval with conditions
events.detail: Human underwriter approved with income verification requirement. Conditional approval pending documentation.

events.label: Fraud pattern detected
events.detail: FraudDetector identified 4 applications from same device with different SSNs. All flagged for verification.

events.label: Denial precedent retrieval
events.detail: CreditScorer retrieved similar high debt-to-income ratio cases and adverse action requirements.
events.queryText: debt-to-income ratio denials adverse action requirements

events.label: Application denied
events.detail: CreditScorer denied application due to debt-to-income ratio (58%, threshold: 45%). Adverse action notice generated.

events.label: Adverse action notice sent
events.detail: ExplanationBuilder generated notice: Denial reasons include high debt-to-income ratio and recent credit inquiries. Included credit score disclosure.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Collections and hardship program envelope activated for customer recovery operations.

events.label: Hardship program offered
events.detail: HardshipEvaluator identified customer with 60+ day delinquency and documented job loss. Offered 3-month payment deferral.

events.label: Fraud dispute retrieval
events.detail: AppealProcessor retrieved similar international transaction disputes and resolution patterns.
events.queryText: international transaction fraud disputes customer appeals

events.label: Fraud alert disputed
events.detail: Customer disputed fraud flag on international transaction. AppealProcessor reviewing travel documentation.

events.label: Fraud flag reversed
events.detail: AppealProcessor validated travel itinerary. Fraud flag removed, transaction approved retroactively. Customer notified.

events.context: Customer disputed international transaction fraud alert, providing travel documentation as evidence
events.chunkText: Fraud alert disputed by customer with documented international travel. Appeal processor reviewing evidence of legitimate transaction pattern.

events.label: DSG: Quarterly fairness review
events.detail: Lending Stewardship Group conducted disparate impact analysis. No significant disparities detected across protected classes.

events.label: Hardship applications increasing
events.detail: Hardship program requests up 18% month-over-month. Correlation with recent layoff announcements in tech sector. Proactive outreach initiated.

events.label: Fraud detection accuracy improving
events.detail: Machine learning model refinements reduce false positive rate to 8.2% (from 12.3%). True positive rate maintained at 94%. Customer friction reduced significantly.

events.label: Compliance metrics on target
events.detail: FairnessMonitor: Approval rate variance across demographics <2%. Adverse action notices: 100% within regulatory timeline. Audit trail: complete.

events.label: Default rate trending upward
events.detail: 90-day delinquency rate increased to 3.1% (from 2.8%). Portfolio concentration in affected industries flagged for enhanced monitoring. Risk models recalibrating.

events.label: Regulatory examination scheduled
events.detail: Federal banking regulator scheduled annual UDAAP examination for next quarter. Focus areas: AI fairness, adverse action compliance, model risk management.

events.label: Threshold adjustment based on DSG feedback
events.detail: Lending Steward adjusted borderline review range from ±5% to ±7% after DSG analysis showed improved outcomes with wider human review band.
events.reason: Increase human oversight for marginal cases to improve fairness outcomes and customer experience.

events.label: Collections compliance retrieval
events.detail: OutreachScheduler retrieved FDCPA contact time restrictions and violation prevention patterns.

events.label: Collections contact blocked
events.detail: OutreachScheduler prevented contact attempt at 10:15pm customer local time. FDCPA violation avoided. Rescheduled for next business day.

events.label: Enhanced contact time restrictions
events.detail: Recovery Steward strengthened automated FDCPA compliance checks after near-violation. Added customer timezone validation.
events.reason: Prevent FDCPA violations through improved timezone and contact hour validation.

events.context: Enhanced FDCPA contact time restrictions with timezone validation
events.chunkText: Recovery Steward enhanced automated compliance checks after collections contact blocked due to late-hour attempt. Added customer timezone validation to prevent FDCPA violations.

events.label: Retrieve FDCPA revision
events.detail: DecisionMemory retrieves the FDCPA contact time restriction revision embedding for collections logic.
events.queryText: FDCPA contact time restriction revision timezone validation

events.label: Fed signals stable rates
events.detail: Federal Reserve minutes indicate no rate changes expected for next two quarters. Lending demand forecast stable. Competitive pressure likely to intensify.

events.label: Hardship program success metrics
events.detail: 82% of hardship participants remain current after 6 months. Default rate among hardship cohort: 12% (vs 45% industry average for similar risk). Program proving effective.

events.label: Monthly lending summary
events.detail: Applications processed: 1,847. Approved: 1,203 (65%). Manual reviews: 284 (15%). Avg approval time: 18 minutes. Zero compliance violations.
